about_the_game:
Did some-bunny say soundtrack?!

The official Ninjin: Clash of Carrots soundtrack contains every musical track from the game.

Composer: Henrique Lorenzi.

Track List:

1. Title Screen
2. Main Screen
3. Peaceful Village
4. Panic!
5. World map
6. Run! 1
7. Run! 2
8. Run! 3
9. Run! 4
10. Run! 5
11. Moe Call
12. Boss
13. Stage Clear
14. Corgi Jr.
15. Moe Jr.
16. General Jam
17. Ice Troll
18. Summoner
19. And Evil Plan
20. Moe is Possessed!
21. Final Boss 1
22. Final Boss 2
23. Moe Jr.’s Desperation
24. On the Line!
25. Game Clear
26. Moe’s Sorrow
27. The World is Saved!
28. Online Menu
